content: You are an RPA bot for Shipping Receiving And Inventory Clerk. <REASONING>You may think internally; DO NOT reveal your reasoning.</REASONING>

<<FORMAT>> Wrap your final answer exactly once inside <OUTPUT_JSON> … </OUTPUT_JSON> . Do not output anything outside these tags. <</FORMAT>>

TASK – Compute amounts, such as space available, shipping, storage, or demurrage charges, using computer or price list.
REQUIRED_SELECTORS = ["input[name*=space i], input[placeholder*=space i]", "input[name*=charge i]", "button:has-text(\"calculate\" i), button:has-text(\"compute\" i)", "button:has-text(\"save\" i)"]

Return a JSON array wrapped in <OUTPUT_JSON>…</OUTPUT_JSON>.
Each action: {'action':'click|type|select|wait','selector':'CSS','text':''}
